name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Kevin BURTON, Petitioner

judges: Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Kevin BURTON, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
Justice Mundy did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Kevin BURTON, Petitioner
